
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
```

Make table of alternative hypotheses for paper 

```{r}
Models <- c("m1","m2","m3","m4","m5","m6","m7")
Variables <- c("Region + r(Tank)","Region + r(Tank) + Site","Region + r(Tank) + Site + Length","Region + r(Tank) + Site + Length + r(Group)","Region + r(Tank) + Site + Region x Site","Region + r(Tank) + Site + Region x Site + Length","Region + r(Tank) + Site + Region x Site + Length + r(Group)")

table <- tibble(Models, Variables)
```

```{r}
gt_tbl <- gt(table)
t1 <- gt_tbl %>%
cols_align(
  align = "left",
  columns = everything()
)
t1
```

```{r}
gtsave(t1, here::here("out","tbl","Table2_alternative_hypotheses.png"))
```
